entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Breaking change] Changing EventSource OnEventCommand to be consistent #84586
  • attempting to use AOT on 32 bit should give specific error #84583
  • SslStream throws when using OpenSSL cert #84575
  • [wasm] Make runtime errors from simd and exception handling failures easy to understand #84574
    8.0.0
  • Source generator targets (from NuGet packages) not running on unsupported TFMs #84570
    8.0.0
  • ImmutableArray cast to IList does not conform to other collection's usage #84565
  • Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #84564
    Future
  • ExceptionOnStartIsPropagated test failed in CI #84562
  • Missing Logging of Exceptions in IHostedService without await #84559
  • Can't build with the new Apple SDK #84557
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #84555
    8.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Optimize "static readonly valuetype" #62430
    8.0.0
  • SuperPMI benchmarks run should enable tiered compilation and pgo #68179
    Future
  • Test failure: Assertion failed `m_Initialized == Initialized` in tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #83401
    8.0.0
  • The first character of the line is not written in Console.Write or WriteLine if Esc was pressed #84261
  • IPAddress.TryFormat returns false erroneously for shorter IP addresses #84482
    8.0.0
  • TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached test failing in CI #84551
  • browser-wasm - WasmApp.targets No way to specify App Base Path #84516
  • Regex bug: Unrecognized escape sequence \\Z #84576
  • IsDaylightSavingTime returning False when it should be returning True #84563
  • SslStream throws when using (some?) OpenSSL self-signed certificates #84505
  • Update Compiler::optUpdateLoopsBeforeRemoveBlock() #84098
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #84139
    8.0.0
  • CctorForWrite failing with NativeAOT #84400
  • [Test] Test build does not give useful error if clr.hosts is not built #62744
    8.0.0
  • [Test] LibariesConfiguration should automatically be detected for runtime tests #63412
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Propagate pthread_kill EAGAIN to thread suspend initiator (remove workaround) #34132
    8.0.0
  • Experiment with icu4x usage for wasm #47875
    8.0.0
  • Creating a pinned GCHandle to an array of a blittable type may fail #48907
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #66344
    8.0.0
  • Test failure _AdvSimd_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm._AdvSimd.Program.VectorLookupExtension_3_SByte() #84554
  • Investigate potential perf improvement if we call an int32 version of TryFormatInt64Default to format numbers less than int.MaxValue (for x86) #27575
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update handling of limited register during consecutive registers allocation #84588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on all the numeric types in corelib #84587
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix assert on passing double in struct #84584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    area-System.Numerics
  • [android][ios] Output Exported Symbols ItemGroup in LibraryBuilder #84581
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Don't use AVX-512 for small inputs in Memmove due to throttle issues #84577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Turn Wasm exception handling on by default and use WasmEnableExceptio… #84573
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • DRAFT: optimize old typeinit/write fix #84558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Guid #84553
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Collections.Immutable.Tests #84552
    area-System.Collections, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/7.0][Android] Free up more disk space on CI builds #84567
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0][Android] Free up more disk space on CI builds #84568
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Move the jiterp backbranch flag to a wasm local #84585
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add SIMD to LowerCallMemcmp #84530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SPMI benchmarks run collections for tiered and tiered pgo #84483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on IPAddress and IPNetwork #84487
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Disable TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached on mono #84571
    area-GC-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable HardwareIntrinsics failing tests on Mono #84475
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Update implementation of optUpdateLoopsBeforeRemoveBlock #84511
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve regex compiler / source generator for sets #84370
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Fix minor jitdisasm issue #84548
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtGetStructHandle` and friends #84212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Version #84556
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label

Updated

  • Minor fixes to write barriers #75478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.5 #84341
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.16 #84342
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #84322
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete `GT_OBJ` #84221
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow removal of HWIntrinsic nodes that do not have side effects #84110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add msquic to debug runtime on macOS #84181
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84444
    Servicing-consider, community-contribution, needs-area-label, 7.0.x
  • Mark tasks projects as non-source projects #84488
    area-Infrastructure
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Mono] Enable the supported V128 SIMD intrinsics on Arm64 across all codegen engines #84289
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    needs-area-label
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84432
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part (backport #84413) #84442
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Fix catastrophic designer fail for NodeForm #84539
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `gtNewIndir` in more places #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable more general BITCAST folding in local morph #84144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    area-Threading-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve SequenceEqual for constant lengths unrolling #84524
    area-System.Memory
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
